attributes.action: keep pontymoile (south wales) war memorial park gates (black) with the plaque for the fallen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we think its disgraceful that  a councillor would go against the wishes of the people of torfaen south wales and have the gates painted green  .
we would like the gates restored black and for the person to apologise to the people of torfean and the decendants of the fallen .
pontymoile south wales  park gates  were painted black in 1924 and made into a war memorial for those who fell in the first world war .
